website_summaries.verdict: Its picture won't blow your mind, but the Hisense R7 series of 4K TVs offers strong streaming features and accurate colors at a rock-bottom price.

customer_reviews.title: I've had the TV set up for a few days ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had the TV set up for a few days now and I'm still tweaking the settings due to the lack of information on the internet for now. I've played my xbox one x on it for a number of hours and there doesnt appear to be any motion lag or ghosting, games do look incredible in 4k. The only boxset I've watched so far is Planet Earth 2 in 4k HDR and it looks out of this world. Decent brightness, no lagging, colours are incredible. So far I'm very impressed with the TV. However they do upsell their speakers a bit, audiophiles might want a soundbar
customer_reviews.author: A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Pin-sharp image on hd tv transmissions (free view). “Upscales” standard transmission images somewhat. Where this fabulous tv really shines though is for gaming! Outrageous graphics from my Playstation Pro! Really “punchy” images!! This appliance is beautifully designed- it’s body is only about 10mm (less than 1/2”) thick for about half the tv and would grace any surrounding environment or decor. Easy set up and tuned itself within a few seconds. Large, well appointed remote is genuinely “idiot-proof”. Enough said. Delighted!
customer_reviews.author: thisolgit

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV!
customer_reviews.text: Quality set, bright vivid colours {see sample pic} - crystal clear picture on 4K content as you would expect. Firmware updated very recently, and from previous experience with hisense gives me confidence that this will be kept up with this set. Sound is reasonable, has additional optical audio for surround sound. It is a 2 person lift though. It's expectedly heavy - the screen is generally slim, with the lowest 20% including the main electronics being thicker. Bezel reasonably thin. I love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hocking

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV, the 4k and uhd shows on Netflix and sky Q are fantastic. This TV also upscales HD to a higher resolution, I wasn't convinced about this claim before I purchased but it works quite well. The sound is a good as any TV I've had if not a little better. I'd definitely recommend this TV and for this price you'd be crazy
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value 4K tv
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Tv going on first impressions, excellent value. Haven’t fiddled with all settings yet to find optimum picture but out of the box default is very good, nice and bright on the eye
customer_reviews.author: Mr Taylor

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: had this a few months now picture perfect no need for sound bar very loud .....Netflix in 4k just lush....
customer_reviews.author: Steven adlington

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant TV for excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Hisense created a brilliant TV, with highest quality, wonderful picture, and decent sound. Looks very lean and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: RT87

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable and sluggish warranty
customer_reviews.text: It’s my second hisense tv and as first this didn’t last. Blew up after return window and now I need to use warranty. Manager of repair company said they are not in my area and can collect tv in week time. That’s see s way too long
customer_reviews.author: Andrzej

customer_reviews.title: A bargain TV of such quality.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing TV — save cash and buy this; the picture, controls, style; all fantastic. I’m quite blown away. Bought through a 3rd party Hughes Electronics — amazing customer service. Do not hesitate to buy this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Michael flaherty

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good TV for the price,picture quality is overall good,some of the blacks are sometimes patchy even with HD.Easy to set up,remote straightforward to use,great that it has a Netflix access button on the remote.Colour is true to life.Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jonno

customer_reviews.title: Hisense makes sense
customer_reviews.text: Not knowing very much about this make I was a little apprehensive in buying it. Now that I've had it a while I can say that it has been a good decision. Great in all departments. Still haven't sorted out the Alexa Echo for using remote control when away from home but not an urgent matter. Perhaps I never will.
customer_reviews.author: LionelG6HXW

customer_reviews.title: Cheap option but decent specs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a cheaper alternative to the more expensive UHD sets out there and haven't been disappointed. The picture is great for the price and whilst it's not the best available out there for the price you can't beat it. The smart features all work great and are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blurry Visions!
customer_reviews.text: There is more blurry visions than you would expect from a 4K Smart TV, not not sure the specs are as good as advertised. But as a cheaper 4K Smart TV I suppose it’s ok. The “app” software is a little behind the times as it does not have Now TV, BT Sports or Disney+
customer_reviews.author: Andrew.R.W

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tv picture is excellent and good sound to. Delivery was superfast from Hughes Electrical despatched one day delivered the next with APC Overnight. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: junio13

customer_reviews.title: Good panel, software is so and so
customer_reviews.text: The image quality and aesthetics is excellent. I just wish the hisense appstore had more apps.
customer_reviews.author: Giorgio F. Gilestro

customer_reviews.title: This TV is amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I miss is that it doesnt turn off itself with the HDMI signal from other devices. Apart form that, the quality is great. vibrant colors and tons of customization options.
customer_reviews.author: Borja

customer_reviews.title: Netflix works, but Amazon player almost never works
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon player loads, is quite slow to populate the screen, and then when you try to watch a video it often says network slow, connection error. I can watch NetFlix on the TV OK, and Amazon works fine on my laptop. So aDSL network speed of 12M download speed is enough. Software updates since I got it in Dec 2018 have not helped.
customer_reviews.author: StephenW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality, good smart TV capability, making this an excellent TV purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality tv Picked up WiFi straight away Used with sky q from hdmi Alexa is a great addition Sound good Picture Great Loads of apps Just can’t get my sound bar to work on it
customer_reviews.author: Simon Adey

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money,good picture and sound. Would recommend the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Valdec Rendalls

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great TV with all the features I wanted.Excellent price for a 65inch TV.
customer_reviews.author: Liverbird

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value 👌
customer_reviews.text: Great tv for the money... Very pleased with sounds and picture quality
customer_reviews.author: dran78

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Superb tv excellent quality and great value I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: David Stocks

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably good value
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably good for the money Looks expensive great pictures and sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Picture and build quality are excellent for the price, would highly recommend as a decent budget smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Real value for money. Excellent picture quality and AI interface. Only drawback is the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Good picture quality, comfortable color tone, extra thin screen panel. Function easy to install & use. Price is good! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sang

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality and colour is also verygood
customer_reviews.text: Great tv excellent picture quality and the sound is good as well
customer_reviews.author: david high

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tv
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday and it looks amazing. Very very thin bezel. Am yet to use it, but I know it would be great. Would update my review then
customer_reviews.author: Natra

customer_reviews.title: Disregard this TV at your peril
customer_reviews.text: Great great TV for the money. Has everything you could require and then some.
customer_reviews.author: MrKenO

customer_reviews.title: Defective screen with a strange green line down the side
customer_reviews.text: Defective screen with a strange green line down the side
customer_reviews.author: John Gillies

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. Sound is not as good as it could be but not terrible (Sound bar recommended). Excellent for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good TV for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered today. Set up was so easy, TV looks great for the money! Still fiddling around with the set up though.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

product_meta.title: Hisense H65U7AUK 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD ULED Smart TV with HDR and Freeview Play - Silver/Black (2018 Model)
product_meta.description:

smart services require internet connection

feature_bullets: Hisense 65inch 4K TV featuring HDR (High Dynamic Range), HLG (Hybrid Log Gamma) and a Quad Core processor for high speed Smart TV: 2017/18 New Range
Perfect Picture featuring Ultra HD 4K - 3840 x 2160 Pixels for Ultra High Definition realism and quality. Dimensions (without stand) (W X H X D): 145.0 x 84.5 x 5.4 cm
Easy to use - Smart TV with Quad Core processor giving access to Freeview Play plus Netflix, YouTube and Amazon streaming services
Ultra Motion Plus: perfect for sports and game lovers as each fast movement appears more smooth with 120Hz Panel and Sports Mode
The bezel-less and super slim design together with the pure metal elevate quality of the single-stand TV set
